title: U.S. Consumer Price Index excluding food and energy 1990 to 2019
summary: In general Consumer Price Index (100=1982-1984) has rose over the Year.
Consumer Price Index (100=1982-1984) is slightly increasing from 1998 to 2009.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2005 and 2006.
The highest Consumer Price Index (100=1982-1984), of value 219.24 was reached at Year 2009
Minimum Consumer Price Index (100=1982-1984) about 173.4 was reached at Year 1998
min_summary: In general Consumer Price Index (100=1982-1984) has rose over the Year.
